title: How couples can survive holiday season stress
text: This sneaky issue is ignored by couples before it blows up in their face. When it comes celebrating, it is imperative to know whose tradition will be followed. While a 50-50 compromise might seem like the way to go, you could also choose to alternate. That way, it is a win-win situation for all.There is immense pressure at this time of the year to be happy all the time. But it might not be possible, especially if preexisting stressors continue to play on your mind. Cut yourself and your partner some slack in such a case.
description: The holiday season puts a lot of stress on couples. Here's how you can deal with some common stressors.
